alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:58PM CDT until July 10 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 558 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brule, or 7 miles east of Big Springs, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant, Brule, Brandon, Wild Horse Spring and Megeath. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 64 and 78. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 110 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
